readable.title: 3448855727_f16dea7b03
readable.content: A group of kids are writing with a black marker on one of their friend 's back . A group of young men laugh as they write on a friend 's back with a marker . Boys at a party drawing on their friend 's back with a black marker . Fellows writing on the back of a friend with black markers . People are writing and drawing on the back of another person with a marker .
